job.title: Test Automation Engineer with Security Clearance
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: Systems Test Engineer We are looking for multiple Systems Test Engineers focused on automation to work in a fast-paced team environment assisting test engineers to integrate and test spacecraft and instrument hardware. You will write, review, update, and implement test procedures as required, use test and measurement equipment to test and troubleshoot spaceflight hardware as well as maintain required test engineering logs, records and provide input to test summary reports.
